claim.description: the claim to be verified (VSL does not care about how its encoded)

claim_type.description: the claim type (could be any string)

proof.description: the proof of the claim (VSL does not care about how its encoded)

nonce.description: the client nonce (64 bit unsigned integer)

to.description: the list of (Ethereum-style) addresses of accounts which can verify this claim

fee.description: the fee for verification (u128 formatted as hex string).

Timestamp.description: Records the time elapsed from the [UNIX_EPOCH]

seconds.description: Time elapsed from the [UNIX_EPOCH] (in seconds, truncated)

nanos.description: the _remaining fraction_ of a second, expressed in nano-seconds
